citances.sentence: Ms Baird argued that, under the current legislation, it is for the opponent to establish its ground on the balance of probabilities, following Pfizer Products Inc v Karam , [2006] FCA 1517 , consistent also with Clinique Laboratories Inc v Luxury Skin Care Brands Pty Ltd [2003] FCA 1517.
